LanguageData.VCE_SimpleDessert.label: simple dessert
LanguageData.VCE_SimpleDessert.description: A simple dessert quickly made from a few fruits and other ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_FineDessert.label: fine dessert
LanguageData.VCE_FineDessert.description: A complex dessert assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_LavishDessert.label: lavish dessert
LanguageData.VCE_LavishDessert.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this dessert nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetDessert.label: gourmet dessert
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetDessert.description: A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity dessert.
